task: Develop a basic 'Mahjong Solitaire' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Don't be afraid of things because they're easy to do'.
name: Tile Ease

branding_data.short_description: Tile Ease is a refreshing take on Mahjong Solitaire, focusing on simplicity and ease of play.
branding_data.detailed_description: Tile Ease offers a minimalist and straightforward approach to the classic Mahjong Solitaire game. Emphasizing the oblique strategy of embracing simplicity, the game is designed to be easy to pick up and play, making it accessible for players of all ages. The interface is clean and intuitive, with gentle color palettes and soothing background music to enhance relaxation. Players can match tiles at their own pace, enjoying the meditative experience without the pressure of timers or complex mechanics. Tile Ease invites you to unwind and enjoy the satisfying process of clearing the board, celebrating the joy of simple achievements.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
